headline: How Investors Are Reacting To General Mills (GIS) Plant Closures and Supply Chain Restructuring Plans
summary: In recent days, General Mills announced a comprehensive multi-year supply chain restructuring initiative that includes closing its pizza crust manufacturing facility in St. Charles and two pet food plants in Joplin, Missouri, with production consolidating at other company locations and restructuring costs expected to total approximately US$82 million through fiscal 2029. This move follows rising industry pressure to streamline operations and reflects General Mills’ intent to enhance...
